"Liu Mei": "Hm? A Meteorn? Looks like it hasn't been long since you landed, huh?"

"I'd love to show you my ARKS training program...
Buuuuut I think you should build yourself up on your own first!"
"I'm Liu Mei, an ARKS Training Instructor! I travel all over, supporting ARKS' activities!"
"As I'm sure you know, DOLLS can be tough customers. You need to train every day if you want to keep up with them!"
"So, I've prepared a training program to help you out with that! Go ahead, take a look!"
"Alright! Check out the training I've got for you!"
